summary: This is a for Harcore players(archers,possible thieves)
descriptionHtml:
[size=+6]I made this mod because after a long time I became impossible to kill with enchants,perks,skills...,i lost my interest and excitement to the game.[/size]


[size=+2]Base of the mod is "Realistic Damage" and tactical play with insane difficulty.This is a for Hardcore players.You do 
great damage and take also great damage.Bow and dagger sneak attacks is legendary.If they see every time you have to 
run for your life.You will kill with one or two hits(shots),but you will die with one(or two)shots.Sneaking every time 
is powerful for killing monsters and bosses,but if they see you,you not have choice,you must run.Archery skills improve 
faster,because you will kill with few hits.Difficulty is Insane,if you change ingame difficulty settings will not 
change.
Improved archery perks-slow time 90%,zoom 90%
Improved Haggling perks-5 ranks you buying selling increase with 90%
And many others changes which I can not remember.[/size]

[size=+4]Requirements[/size]

 [color=(red)]Latest Update of Skyrim

Compatibility:

[/color]This is not scripting and compatible with all other mods,but not compatible with difficulty changed mods!Not get errors,but difficulty is not effect.
author: Ayhanayhan1
